name: bayesian-flashcards
description: A spaced repetition flashcard application using Bayesian inference

scripts.start-electron-dev: concurrently "npm run start-frontend" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && npm run start-electron"
scripts.build: npm run build-frontend && npm run build-backend
scripts.build-backend: cd backend && python -m PyInstaller --onefile --name app app.py
scripts.electron-dev: concurrently "npm run start-frontend" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron ."
scripts.dist: npm run build && npm run electron-pack

author: Leon Chlon
